activities: Management of Human Resource Data on behalf of companies resident in the European Union.  Our software is licensed to these organizations for them to run in data centers and on networks controlled exclusively by them, with access and authorizations managed by them.
recoursemech: We comply with legal or regulatory supervisory authorities that provide for handling of individual complaints and dispute resolution; and commitment as required by our clients to cooperate with data protection authorities located in the European Union; EU Data Protection Authorities
